content: Ah, hold on, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>! I see you've been saving up Dough for house construction.
Hoho, I wonder if you've discovered some "inconspicuous" dirt mounds lately.
This <color=#8AAB4B>wooden shovel</color> Creation Card will definitely come in handy. Please take it.
There might actually be surprises inside if you dig it out. There's a good saying that goes, "The golden beard hides beneath unsuspecting eyes."
Hoho~ This <color=#8AAB4B>construction safety kit</color> is also for you, because... well, you're digging down, it's best to be "well-armed," just in case.
I hope you build a new home soon and start your comfortable living. If you have any questions, feel free to ask me any time.
After mulling it over, I feel you might be interested in an Astralink urban legend. It's about the "Wild growth of Dough land on Bubble Worlds."
